metadata.name: Suspicious Child Process of AspNetCompiler
metadata.comment: Detects potentially suspicious child processes of "aspnet_compiler.exe".

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\aspnet_compiler.exe')) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\calc.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\notepad.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\appdata\\local\\roaming\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\tasks\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\tasks\\'))))

output.summary: Detects potentially suspicious child processes of "aspnet_compiler.exe".
